lst.name: sentence
lst.str: A further 3.5 pct fall in the terms of trade in the quarter underscored the need to continue restraint in wages, prices and public sector spending and borrowing to improve Australia's competitiveness, he said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "It is clear that through the continued application of that strategy Australia will make the necessary adjustments in its external accounts and return to a more sustainable growth pattern," he added.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The strong contribution of exports to the growth in Australia's gross domestic product (GDP) in the fourth quarter of 1986 was a significant and welcome feature of the data, private economists polled by Reuters said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: A further 3.5 pct fall in the terms of trade in the quarter underscored the need to continue restraint in wages, prices and public sector spending and borrowing to improve Australia's competitiveness, he said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "It is clear that through the continued application of that strategy Australia will make the necessary adjustments in its external accounts and return to a more sustainable growth pattern," he added.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The strong contribution of exports to the growth in Australia's gross domestic product (GDP) in the fourth quarter of 1986 was a significant and welcome feature of the data, private economists polled by Reuters said.
